review.title: “It has been a very good experience to work with the top one company.”
review.pros: Pros – because it is a number 1 medical transcription company in the world.
review.cons: Cons – sometimes recognition will not be done for sincere and hardworking employees.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “BEST so far.. Learned a lot , if you are willing to learn, then be here or look something else that suits you.”
review.pros: Pros – Good dictators with exception of 1-2
review.cons: Cons – Salary is very less for the work you do. Burn day and night to get minimum wages.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Please treat us as humans

review.title: “MT/QA - Originally good, now VERY BAD.”
review.pros: Pros – Good accounts and good amount of work.
review.cons: Cons – There are YEARLY DECREMENTS in salary. Company doesn't give a sh*t about their employees, no matter if you've been appointed new or you've been with them for 5+ years.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Stop being douche bags and pay careful attention to your employees. You reduce quality incentive rates annually, thereby decreasing your employee's monthly salaries and increasing your profits, but you guys are NOTHING without your employees. ALWAYS REMEMBER THAT.

review.title: “It was a learning experience.”
review.pros: Pros – The salary is on time with no delays.
review.cons: Cons – You have to watch whether the incentives are appropriately credited or not.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Unprofessional”
review.pros: Pros – None that I can think of.
review.cons: Cons – Very unprofessional working atomosphere, very immature management.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend – I'm not optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Most conducive atmosphere to learn and work in transcription.”
review.pros: Pros – The environment in which we work is enjoyable. The interaction between transcriptionists and the middle management is very friendly. The facilities are many to spend when some free time is available. The prospects for growth are many.
review.cons: Cons – Two days off per week was recently changed to six days per moth, and this was one of the most unfavorable measure by the company.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The reason for reducing the number off per month was that there was no coverage for the weekends. The management could have asked employes to present at least one Saturday and one Sunday per month could have solved this problem, but the management did not consider this.

review.title: “This company is not highly recommended...”
review.pros: Pros – I cannot think of any pros other than the fact that timing was flexible to a small extent...
review.cons: Cons – No transport, horrible food. The management makes policies that seem like they have been designed to fleece employees. Favoritism, politics. No growth financially as well as career-wise.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Focus on employees and everything else will fall in its place.

review.title: “Dead End Job”
review.pros: Pros – The pay is okay if you are a middle class person.
review.cons: Cons – This is a Dead End Job with no future prospects.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Was of a mixed one, no real transparency and confusing policies”
review.pros: Pros – Good atmosphere to work, but not rewarding
review.cons: Cons – Confusing and unstable salary structure
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – No proper work to acheive given targets and nil growth in terms of monetary benefits

review.title: “It was a good experience”
review.pros: Pros – Great work culture, understanding seniors
review.cons: Cons – high targets with not good work flow
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Horrible salary and bad management”

review.cons: Cons – Bad salary, Bad politics, Bad management, Policies are not employee friendly, Horrible canteen
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – make a friendly policy for the employees
